about_the_game:
Souls Cards is a single-player roguelike deck-builder game where you must create synergies to score points!

You're dead... Welcome to Hell! get your soul back?

You Will have to play the devil card game and reach the bottom of hell!

In Soul Cards, everything is about scoring enough points to reach the goal before the deadline and survive. To score points you will play of board of Items and Souls.

As you go deeper and deeper in hell, the goal will get higher and higher but don't worry. After each round survived you will be rewarded with money. Spend this money in the hub to improve your build !

  • Buy new Souls and Items at the shop

  • Enhance your current deck at the Obelisk

  • Sacrifice one of your Souls to get unique rewards

It's up to you to choose how to spend your money!

Discover a huge amount of content:

  • +50 Items to create your deck

  • +50 Souls with unique effects to recruit

  • 9 Different spells to modify your deck

  • 8 Materials to modify and boost your items

short_description: Souls Cards is a retro single-player deckbuilder roguelite. Customize your deck, recruit powerful characters, modify your cards, and defeat the devil and his minions to get your soul back!
